2. Acute myeloid leukemia (AML)
3. Chronic myeloid leukemia (CML)
4. Autoimmune hemolytic anemia (AIHA)
5. Immune thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP)
6. Henoch-Schönlein purpura (HSP)
